childMarkdownRemark.html:
• Brightly coloured paint
  • Washing up liquid
  • Paint pots or disposable pots
  • Straws
  • Paper

Add a small amount of paint to a pot. Add half the amount of washing-up liquid. Encourage the child to blow through straws into the paint. Supervise carefully, they sometimes suck!

When lots of bubbles have formed, gently place a piece of paper over the bubbles. This will create beautiful patterns.
